column5: RIGHT!! Going back to USA on Sat June 10th about 230PM at Ft Frances the Cars & Trucks were Backed UP for about 2 miles to enter Canada. Was a Big Surprise as I thought the Traffic might be jammed up going back to USA. Larry Schroeder

Remember all the complaining about Canada and lodge / resort owners. The complaints about refunds on deposits, time limits to use them ect. Today (Sat. June 3rd) the traffic was backed up 150 yards around the corner getting to the I-Falls toll bridge at noon. Seems alot of guys who had very strong opinions swallowed their keyboard bravado and are taking trips again. Traffic North & South on Hwy 53 by I-Falls was very heavy. Hope the lodge / resorts guys have record summers.
Yup, life goes on. Hard to cut back on the good thins in life.
Funny, I don't remember that much complaining about the lodges that carried over deposits until the next year. I do remember the one outfitter that was going to keep deposits was not very popular.
People are realizing how tough it is to catch numbers of fish in the states and just saying f-it I'm going back to Ontario.
We paid the toll at 0645 and a long line but 3 lanes open and we’re done by 0710. It’s hot up here but tomorrow we’ll see how the bite is
Business is booming.i live up on hwy 105 and traffick was nuts today.Hot weather.swam in Eagle today was really nice.72/73 f.Fish are biting like crazy.
Lol.Busier than ever at Clarks.Dont forget to check their bait store out on hwy 17 and 105.Got minnows,crawlers and leeches.plus some snacks for your trip north
the poster above showed some class and didn't mention the name, and then you went and spilled the beans

Two Septembers back our group of three cars, two towing boats went through at the Thousand Islands. We were the only vehicles going through, mid day, Saturday at a crossing that has at least eight entry booths. In over fifty times through I never saw anything like it. In two weeks we go through again. I think we'll have more company this time.
Could be we've lost some viewers on the WC channel.
